explains: n. [植] 子房；[解剖] 卵巢
wordGroup: polycystic ovary syndrome 多囊卵巢综合征

sentences.en: In females, synthesis of estrogens starts in theca interna cells in the ovary, by the synthesis of androstenedione from cholesterol.
sentences.cn: 在雌性中，通过从胆固醇中合成雄烯二酮，开始在卵巢的间膜细胞中合成雌激素。

sentences.en: FSH spurs egg maturation in ovary.
sentences.cn: FSH催促卵细胞在卵巢的成熟。

sentences.en: Blood tests and ovary scans only give women a few years' advance notice.
sentences.cn: 血液检测和卵巢扫描只能为女性提供提前几年的通告。
